channel.title: Python on Edward Jazzhands
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Edward Jazzhands

item.title: Textual-Color-O-Matic
item.author: ed.jazzhands@gmail.com (Edward Jazzhands)
item.description: A widget for Textual that makes it easy to display ASCII art with color effects and animations.

item.title: Textual-Pyfiglet
item.author: ed.jazzhands@gmail.com (Edward Jazzhands)
item.description: A widget that fully integrates the famous FIGlet ASCII art generator into Textual.

item.title: Textual-SlideContainer
item.author: ed.jazzhands@gmail.com (Edward Jazzhands)
item.description: Provides a new container, the SlideContainer. Makes it easy to create sliding or hidden menu bars.

item.title: Textual-Window
item.author: ed.jazzhands@gmail.com (Edward Jazzhands)
item.description: A Textual widget for a floating, draggable window and included window bar/manager system.

item.title: EZPubSub
item.author: ed.jazzhands@gmail.com (Edward Jazzhands)
item.description: An ultra simple, modern pub/sub library and blinker alternative for Python.
